description:
The battle ends with Biscotti`s victory, but Sink learns that Millhiore was not aware that once he was summoned to Flonyard, he cannot return home. Meanwhile, Leonmichelli`s younger brother, Gaul, learns of his sister`s defeat and is eager to face Sink in combat.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Want to Go Home! I Can`t Go Home? Hero in Flognarde!
帰りたい! 帰れない? 勇者inフロニャルド!
